metadata.title: CVE-2023-3385 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from8.10 before 16.0.8, all versions starting from 16.1 before 16.1.3, allversions starting from 16.2 before 16.2.2. Under specific circumstances, auser importing a project 'from export' could access and read unrelatedfiles via uploading a specially crafted file. This was due to a bug in`tar`, fixed in[`tar-1.35`](https://lists.gnu.org/archive/html/info-gnu/2023-07/msg00005.html).

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
